name: Aquatick
description:
Bounce, stomp, launch and swim through obstacle-filled, bite-sized levels where speed is key. Find all the pickups as fast you can and beat the high score

The game

Aquatick is a 2D arcade platformer filled with short, yet challenging levels. In each level, pickups have spawned that need to be collected to stop the clock and finish the level. 

From stomping on the ground and breaking objects, to swimming through patches of water, with a varied moveset, everything is possible. Each level can be approached in different ways to optimize the speedrun gameplay. 

Features
  • Fast-paced levels
  • Online leaderboards
  • Immersive rumble
How to play

First, create an account (secured with Microsoft Playfab Services) so your high scores can be uploaded to the leaderboard. Choose a level using the d-pad on your controller. 

Note: The game is only playable using a gamepad (controller).

Controls  AJumpA (hold in water)LaunchX StompLeft ShoulderQuick-reset

You can support the game and its creator (me :)) by purchasing the game, or donating ETH to 0x32199C885D474E026aF920484f466967486F83cd.
